EmailTemplate.subject: Fast, Reliable Global In-flight Connectivity for Your Business Jet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Dear Customers,
Experience truly fast and reliable global connection speeds when you upgrade to Honeywell’s Ka-band in-flight connectivity solution, JetWave™, now certified on your business jet.
JetWave, which exclusively powers Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX service, provides worldwide coverage at speeds up to 15 Mbps. Jet ConneX is the first, consistent high-speed broadband service to span the world, allowing you to stream content, download large files and host video conferences simultaneously from anywhere on the aircraft.
Pair your JetWave upgrade today with Honeywell’s GoDirect services to manage your connection speeds from 30,000 feet. With GoDirect’s simple and easy-to-use mobile apps, pilots, passengers and crews can manage a variety of actions from connectivity to flight operations from a mobile device to ensure you’re getting the most from your system.
Contact us today to learn more about JetWave and see why hundreds of aircraft are flying with it now.
